UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity determinants in antifungal plant defensins MsDef1 and MtDef4 with different modes of action against Fusarium graminearum.
Literature.Author: Sagaram US, Pandurangi R, Kaur J, Smith TJ, Shah DM

Literature.Title: Plant defensin peptides have antifungal and antibacterial activity against human and plant pathogens.
Literature.Author: Sathoff AE, Velivelli S, Shah D, Samac DA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fusarium graminearum PH-1(IC50=14µM),Fusarium graminearum PH-1(MIC=24µM),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 7F-3(no activity data),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 31F-3(no activity data),Ascochyta medicaginicola STC(IC50=12.7±1.1µM),Ascochyta medicaginicola WS-2(IC50=14.8±1.0µM),Colletotrichum trifolii FG-1(no activity data),Colletotrichum trifolii WS-5(no activity data),Aphanomyces euteiches MF-1(no activity data),Aphanomyces euteiches MER4(no activity data),Fusarium solani(no activity data),Fusarium tricinctum(no activity data),Fusarium redolens(no activity data),Fusarium incarnatum(no activity data),Xanthomonas alfalfae subsp. alfalfae F3(IC50=7.9±0.7µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae ALF3(IC50=8.8±1.1µM)
